name: get_antonyms
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool dicolink.
Tool description: Dicolink API lets you retrieve information about French words, including definitions, synonyms, antonyms, quotes, expressions, lexical field, scrabble score, and much more...
API description: Fetches antonyms for a given word using the Dicolink API.

mot.description: The word for which to find antonyms.

limite.description: The maximum number of antonyms to return. Defaults to 10.
